@description.name: @description
@description.body: The ScrollArea provides a container widget with on demand scroll bars if the content size exceeds the size of the container.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: pane {qx.ui.core.scroll.ScrollPane} pane which holds the content to scroll
@childControl.description: pane which holds the content to scroll

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: corner {qx.ui.core.Widget} corner where no scrollbar is shown
@childControl.description: corner where no scrollbar is shown

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The default width which is used for the width of the scroll bar if overlaid.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired as soon as the scroll animation in X direction ends.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired as soon as the scroll animation in Y direction ends.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The policy, when the horizontal scrollbar should be shown.

  • auto: Show scrollbar on demand
  • on: Always show the scrollbar
  • off: Never show the scrollbar

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The policy, when the horizontal scrollbar should be shown.

  • auto: Show scrollbar on demand
  • on: Always show the scrollbar
  • off: Never show the scrollbar

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Group property, to set the overflow of both scroll bars.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The threshold for the x-axis (in pixel) to activate scrolling at the edges.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The threshold for the y-axis (in pixel) to activate scrolling at the edges.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The factor for slowing down the scrolling.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the dimensions of the pane.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map|null} The pane dimension in pixel. Contains the keys width and height.
@return.description: The pane dimension in pixel. Contains the keys width and height.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the top offset of the given item in relation to the inner height of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the top offset of the end of the given item in relation to the inner height of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the left offset of the given item in relation to the inner width of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the left offset of the end of the given item in relation to the inner width of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the element's content to the given left coordinate

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Integer} The vertical position to scroll to.
@param.description: The vertical position to scroll to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number?} The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the element's content by the given left offset

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Integer} The vertical position to scroll to.
@param.description: The vertical position to scroll to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number?} The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the scroll left position of the content

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the element's content to the given top coordinate

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Integer} The horizontal position to scroll to.
@param.description: The horizontal position to scroll to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number?} The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the element's content by the given top offset

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Integer} The horizontal position to scroll to.
@param.description: The horizontal position to scroll to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number?} The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the scroll to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the scroll top position of the content

@description.name: @description
@description.body: In case a scroll animation is currently running in X direction, it will be stopped. If not, the method does nothing.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: In case a scroll animation is currently running in X direction, it will be stopped. If not, the method does nothing.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the scroll animation end event for both scroll bars.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the scroll event of the horizontal scrollbar

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the scroll event of the vertical scrollbar

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the horizontal scroll event of the pane

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the vertical scroll event of the pane

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for visibility changes of horizontal scrollbar.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for visibility changes of horizontal scrollbar.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Computes the visibility state for scrollbars.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates a new scrollbar. This can either be a styled qooxdoo scrollbar or a native browser scrollbar.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: orientation {String?"horizontal"} The initial scroll bar orientation

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Responsible for adding the event listener needed for scroll handling.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Responsible for removing the event listener needed for scroll handling.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for the pointerdown event which simply stops the momentum scrolling.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Roll event handler

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Finds the first scrollable parent (in the parent chain).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} The widget to start from.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the widget is scrollable.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the bounds of the given scrollable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
@param.description: Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map with all four bounds (e.g. {"left":0, "top":20, "right":0, "bottom":80}).
@return.description: A map with all four bounds (e.g. {"left":0, "top":20, "right":0, "bottom":80}).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the edge type or null if the pointer isn't within one of the thresholds.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: diff {Map} Difference map with all for edgeTypes.
@param.description: Difference map with all for edgeTypes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the axis ('x' or 'y') by the edge type.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} If edgeType is not one of the distinct four ones.
@throws.description: If edgeType is not one of the distinct four ones.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the threshold amount by edge type.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Number} The threshold of the x or y axis.
@return.description: The threshold of the x or y axis.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the scrollbar is visible.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
@param.description: Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the scrollbar is exceeding it's maximum position.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: amount {Number} Amount to scroll which may be negative.
@param.description: Amount to scroll which may be negative.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the amount will exceed the scrollbar max position.
@return.description: Whether the amount will exceed the scrollbar max position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Calculates the threshold exceedance (which may be negative).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: diff {Number} Difference value of one edgeType.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Calculates the scroll amount (which may be negative). The amount is influenced by the scrollbar size (bigger = faster) the exceedanceAmount (bigger = faster) and the slowDownFactor.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the given scrollable on the given axis for the given amount.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
@param.description: Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the dragend event.
